modName: Gardens of Riften and Thieves Hiedout
summary:
Replaces the Center of the Market with some Statues and fountains.
Added Lanterns to the dark pathway along the Cemetery.
Illuminated Shopsigns.
Complete visual change of the Ragged Flaggon after finishing Thieves Questline
descriptionHtml:
The second \"Gardens of\"-Mod is here!
Gardens of Riften changes some small visual Details and adds Lanterns, Statues and a Fountain in the Town Center.
Beside that, i changed the ragged Flaggon to appear more mystic after finishing the Thieves Questline.
this mod is not finished yet, i will ad some more animals and Insects, maybe some trees and bushes.
I think about adding some light pillows but dont know how to make it fit with the lore.
Please feel free to add own suggestions for Gardens of Riften so it can grow on and on:)
author: Madbane

files.name: Gardens of Riften and Thieves Hiedout
